description: Building internal tools and data pipelines for Auto Finance operations.
highlights: Unified site across teams using Rust backend (Lambda) and Next.js
Built ETL pipeline processing millions of data points for Auto Finance agreements
Developed interactive dashboard improving data interfacing for business and IT teams
Implemented machine learning model to help partnered dealerships improve processing speed
Refined build pipeline and implemented linters into GitLab CI/CD workflows
Onboarded team to best practices with tools like uv, ruff, and pre-commit

description: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.
